title: Inception
description: A skilled thief who steals secrets from people's dreams is given a chance at redemption if he can plant an idea into someone's mind. A mind-bending journey through layered realities where time bends and nothing is what it seems.

keywords: dreams, heist, reality, subconscious, thriller, mindbending

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest challenge as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham City. A gritty exploration of heroism and chaos that redefined superhero cinema with unforgettable performances.

keywords: superhero, crime, dc, batman, villain, chaos

description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival. An emotional journey across time and space exploring love, sacrifice, and the mysteries of the universe.

keywords: space, wormhole, timetravel, survival, emotional, universe
